subject: Concussions
Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The disclosure by the Rangers this week that defenseman Marc Staal sustained a concussion last February has put a spotlight on the N.H.L.’s policy on public disclosure of injuries.
snippet: The disclosure by the Rangers this week that defenseman Marc Staal sustained a concussion last February has put a spotlight on the N.H.L.’s policy on public disclosure of injuries.
